General.Name: Tian Jin Motor Dies Co Ltd
General.Description: Tianjin Motor Dies Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, design, production, and sale of automobile body panel molds and supporting products in China and internationally. The company offers automobile body panel molds, automobile body stamping parts, inspection tools, and welding fixtures; and aviation parts. Tianjin Motor Dies Co., Ltd. was founded in 1965 and is headquartered in Tianjin, China.
General.Address: Tianjin Airport Economic Zone, Tianjin, China, 300308
